Title: Capture the Flag
Writer: Jordi Gasull (escrita por), Javier López Barreira (escrita por), Neil Landau (escrita por), Jordi Gasull (argumento), Patxi Amezcua, Paco Sáez (development and creative senior)
Actors: Dani Rovira, Michelle Jenner, Carme Calvell, Javier Balas
Plot: A young surfer rallies his friends to stop a billionaire from rewriting history as a way to hoard Helium 3, the clean energy of the future.
